name: Snake Overkill
description:
Roam, collect and grow!
A classic Snake gameplay loop with a twist!
... okay not really I only added levels but it has a nice retro graphics.

Tbh it's not that exciting of the game, but I wanted to make something simple as my first game to see what it takes to complete one and I learned a ton!

The best part about the game I would say is the graphics so if you would like to experience nice 8 bit retro graphics, feel free to download the game and play it for a bit. It has only 5 levels so it won't take long to beat.

I hope you enjoy it and feel free to follow me for more exciting games that will be coming soon :)
